name: GiveUpDown
description:
We are 3 Gaéliane Delval aka (@fowi_g), Gabriel Paumelle aka (SkyDrays), and Raphaël Horion aka (@HorionRaphael).
We are students in game making, its the first game of Gaéliane and the seconds of Gabriel !

We use the room of our shool for this Jam so thanks to e-artsup Lille and the other teams who stayed all night with us !

You can discover more works on http://radon.raccoonlabs.fr and on my itch.io profile https://radonraph.itch.io
